title: Team Quest Recruiting for Sister Team
body:
Team Quest is currently recruiting players for its Sister Team.

We are an eSports organisation based around the ideal of personal and team improvement through hard work and commitment. We put in the hours and the infrastructure to give you the opportunity to reach your potential in League of Legends. 

At Quest we value culture over rank and looking to create a strong player base of dedicated gamers workig together to reach to our goals.

We are looking for Plat 1+ players in these positions (will be updated as we recruit):

- Top
- Mid
- JG
- ADC
- Sup

As an organisation we will provide:

Regular scrim opportunities
Feedback to improve your individual and team performance
A non-toxic environment
Passion for growing the eSports scene in OCE

What we expect from our players:

- Commitment to regular team practices and working in your own time to improve
- Passion and competitive desire, we want to create a culture where everyone is striving to improve
- A non-toxic attitude - Any form of discrimination or harassment will not be tolerated
- A working microphone and good internet connection

If you are interested please contact me in game (IGN Bardarella) or email me at bardarellagg@gmail.com to discus

Thank you,

Sam aka Bardarella
